ai-patthana18.12:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.12:0.3_0: Transmigration with causes, for the sake of good fortune,
ai-patthana18.12:1.1_0: Please teach because of this cause, without cause, conditions, and with the reason why only the teaching doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.12:2.1_0: It is not possible for the sake of because of cause or reason,
